Thief™ II: The Metal Age
The ultimate thief is back! Tread softly as you make your way through 15 new complex, non-linear levels full of loot to steal and guards to outsmart. Improved enemy AI, new gadgets and a riveting story will draw you into the world of Thief™ II: The Metal Age, a place of powerful new technologies, fanatical religions and corruption.

About This Game

The ultimate thief is back! Tread softly as you make your way through 15 new complex, non-linear levels full of loot to steal and guards to outsmart. Improved enemy AI, new gadgets and a riveting story will draw you into the world of Thief™ II: The Metal Age, a place of powerful new technologies, fanatical religions and corruption.

Key Features:

  • Thrilling, stealth-based FPS gameplay
  • Complex, non-linear levels allow you to choose a different path every time
  • Advanced enemy AI and sophisticated new master thief tools to outwit them
  • Gripping narrative with intriguing subplots through 15 huge missions

Awards

  • Hall of fame entry in Gamespy
  • Greatest Games of All Time entry in Gamespot
  • 3rd annual Academy of Interactive Arts and Sciences Awards (2000) - Outstanding Achievement in Character or Story Development
READ MORE

System Requirements

    • OS: Windows XP or Windows Vista
    • Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor
    • Memory: 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended)
    • Hard Disk Space: 2GB HDD
    • Video Card: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended)
    • DirectX®: 7
READ MORE

Thief™ II: The Metal Age (c) 2000 Square Enix Limited. All Rights Reserved. Developed by Looking Glass Studios. Thief™ and Thief™ II: The Metal Age are trademarks of Square Enix Limited.

the.borg
111 products in account
15 reviews
Recommended
52.5 hrs on record
Posted: September 27
wow !

this is probably the best stealth game ever created, the atmospheare in this game is amazing.
if you want to expirence a well made game you should get this and the first thief game (thief gold) as well.

each level in this game is very well designed with huge space and many secret stuff,documents to read and alot of loot :)

comparing to the first game this game improves in the way that you don't have to deal with ghosts and monsters anymore instead you will deal with gaurds and automatic machines :)

also you get to use new equpiment such as gas mine,flash mine,invisibility and slowfall potion,you also get a camera like eye ball that you can throw and see behind corners,flares to see at night etc...

i wish game makers would learn from this game and invest more time to create a better gameplay and game machanics instead of fancy graphics.

anyway just click buy and enjoy one of the best games ever :)
